0.name: Apparatus concept
0.text:
Apparatus MK3

Plugs for apparatus sockets.
Titanium top.
Titanium base.
Crystal pulser and crystal holder.
Highly dense glass.

This device might be able to harness the power of the crystaline cubes and use them to power ships, facilities and possibly entire cities.

The pulser will ensure the crystals are perpetually generating vast amounts of electricity at all times.

The titanium in combination with this kind of glass will prevent it from overheating and destroying itself on the spot.

1.name: Cube findings
1.text:
Crystaline cube

These cubic shaped anomalies are covelant crystals.
Possibly made from a chemical reaction.

Slightly luminescent.

Highly volatile. Known to release rays of electricity and another unidentified material.

Not many cleavage planes. Mainly in cubic formations.
Appears to generate piezoelectricity even when slightly moved.

Interesting patern.

Crystalised Chisel

The item was left near a cube. After a few electric pulses from the cube it turned crystalline.

Does not appear to have the same properties as the cube.
Useless.


These cubes could be used for highly efficient power sources if their volatile abilities are harnessed in a proper way.

Do not get close or leave any items near them.
Especially while charged.

2.name: 1Findings
2.text:
We, quarry sector_4 on Cubatres have found an unidentified crystal.

We discovered this.. anomaly earlier today. It would light up nearby torches and lightbulbs.
It also seems to turn nearby objects into similarly look crystal.
This happened earlier to some of our equipment.

I ask to have experts send over to identify what this could be and if it is of any use to our company.

For the time being it will be stored in Storage Area C.

- Head of operation QS_4

3.name: 2Findings
3.text:
Something has gone wrong. One of the anomalies in our storage areas have gone missing after a loud pulse like sound.
Our security cameras show nobody entering or leaving this area, it disappeared on its own.

And the employee who was watching over storage at the time has now been turned to crystal.

I fear this might call for an emergency evacuation considering we don't know what we're dealing with yet.

I now ask for immediate help.

- Head of operation QS_4

4.name: Crystalised note
4.text:
They won't let us near it.
They won't let us touch the smoothness of the crytal.
They won't let us feel the embrace of its glowy shell.
They won't let us experience the relief.
They won't stop us from becoming one.
They won't stop us from being enlightened.
They won't stop us. They can't stop us.
They won't stop us. They can't stop us.
They won't stop us. They can't stop us.
